actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To allow a deduction for income tax purposes of certain expenses incurred by the taxpayer for the education of a dependent.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for expenses incurred by the taxpayer for the education of a dependent. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 154(e)(1)(c))

titles.title: To allow a deduction for income tax purposes of certain expenses incurred by the taxpayer for the education of a dependent.
